data.title: The weather in February in Russia
data.meta_description: The average weather for the month of February in Russia. Read about the average temperatures and rainfall in Russia for February.
data.text:
Normal weather for Russia in February

It's cold in February in Russia with an average temperature of -3°C. Temperatures this month range from a low of -7°C to a high of 1°C. At night, you can expect temperatures between -12°C and -5°C.

In February, there is an average of 33 mm of precipitation, spread over 14 days days. Of the total precipitation, about 44 cm falls as snow in February. The wind speed is around 4 Bft, mostly coming from the Southwest.

The UV index is a maximum of 3 this month. That's a moderate value on the intensity scale of 1 to 11. Unprotected skin can burn in about 30 minutes.

The highest recorded temperature on February in recent years was 6°C in 2021. The lowest daytime temperature on this day was -39°C in 2020. The extreme night temperatures ranged from a low of -49°C to a high of 3°C.

Daily Temperature in February in Russia

This chart shows the average daily high temperatures in February in Russia, measured in degrees Celsius. The bottom of the chart shows the days of February. Based on historical data, it shows the average daily temperatures for this month.

Daily Rainfall in February in Russia

This chart shows the average daily rainfall in February for Russia, measured in millimetres over the past years. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it’s snow or hail. The bottom of the chart shows the days of February. Based on historical data, this chart gives an idea of how much rain you can expect each day.

Daily Snowfall in February in Russia

This chart shows the average daily snowfall in February in Russia, measured in centimetres. The bottom of the chart shows the days of the month. The data is based on historical measurements and gives an idea of the average snowfall in February.

Daily UV Index in February in Russia

This chart shows the average daily UV index in February in Russia, with the UV index ranging from 0 to a maximum of 11. The bottom of the chart shows the days of the month. Based on historical data, this chart provides an idea of the daily UV radiation levels you can expect.

Temperature in February in Russia Over the Years

This chart shows the average temperature in February in Russia, measured in degrees Celsius, over the past years.

Total Rainfall in February in Russia Over the Years

This chart shows the average rainfall in February in Russia, measured in millimetres over the past years. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it’s snow or hail.

Snowfall in February in Russia per year

This chart shows the average snowfall in February in Russia, measured in centimetres, over the past years.
